original_title: UFC Fight Night 97: Lamas vs. Penn
overview: A featherweight bout between former title challenger Ricardo Lamas and former UFC Lightweight and Welterweight Champion B.J. Penn was expected to serve as the main event. However, on October 4, Penn pulled out of the fight citing an injury. In turn, the promotion announced on October 6 that they had cancelled the event entirely.
title: UFC Fight Night 97: Lamas vs. Penn
